author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower wall waterproofing and tile tips…tile showers begin with framing. I add 1/4 inch plywood strips to the studs. This allows the KERDI-BOARD to remain plumb while dropping over the tub flange. In addition, it makes tile installation easier and straightforward. If you’re building a shower check out our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tileshower #bathroominspiration #bathroomremodel #diybathroom #diy
title: Shower Wall Waterproofing and Tile Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
